attributes.action: Change school hours from 10am to 4pm to ease congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't believe there is any clear cut solution for reducing congestion but there are some inherent problems with our road networks and how we use them. Most business hours are between 9am and 5pm so the morning rush is shared with millions of parents driving their children to school. I'm sure everyone who drives at peak times have noticed almost half the vehicles on the road during summer holiday and half term times, having schools start at 10am would encourage more parents to seek other forms of transport or even walking (exorcise!) for their children and as an added benefit there would be daylight for school start and end times all year round.
